name: La Llorona's Babies
description:
Controls

WASD for movement

J to attack

Spacebar for jumping

Objective

Go through the level and touch all the kids, then go back to the lady at the beginning of the game.

Whenever you run out of bolillos you lose the game and have to start from scratch.

Press ALT-F4 to exit the game.

Windows might prompt a blue warning, I usually work on Linux and don't have a valid key to sign my executables.
